main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky for approximately 30 minutes on November 12, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared round in shape and made no sound., The observation lasted for a total of 30 minutes., The object changed its course from straight to maneuvering., The estimated speed at which the object disappeared was approximately 1,000 mph., The conclusion was that there was insufficient data to form a definitive conclusion.
witness description: A civilian was driving between Cedar Hill and High Ridge, MO.
